elements.text: Joining a boxing class has helped you find excitement in movement again. During today's class, your symptoms are making it difficult to perform as well as you would like. You consider quitting for the day, but you remember that your main goal is to have...

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
